This directory stores the libmysofa library from https://github.com/hoene/libmysofa written by Christian Hoene (Linux) and Piotr Majdak (Windows). 

We use version 0.5(Windows) of 2.7.2017. SOFAlizer requires the files mysofa.lib and mysofa.pdb in the directories x64/Release and x64/Debug.

Update: Version of 09.2021 was used for SOFAlizer 1.3.0 (miho)
